channel.title: 🏢 CLCG, University of Groningen on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 CLCG, University of Groningen on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: QE4PE: Word-level Quality Estimation for Human Post-Editing
item.description: QE4PE: Word-level QE’s impact on MT post-editing with 42 pro-editors across English-Italian/Dutch is investigated. Usability&accuracy challenges in professional workflows are underlined.
